# Haxe Roundup № 134

Matthew Wallace has released his first haxelib project, BBMVC. Checkout Matthews intro post to read why it was created.

Jonas has released an Haxe NME BBMVC example for everybody to learn from. Very cool.

Matthew has also posted, How to embed assets in Haxe, like in ActionScript.

Alexander has tweeted this excellent article about using Nape and Haxe Flixel together, written by ProG4mr.

Alexander has ported BunnyMark to Haxe Punk, to see what performance gains Haxe Punk has to offer since its v2 release, but he needs your help to improve it.

[Fr]link 14 has written an article about using Haxe with HTML5 WebWorkers.
